title: Mohsin Naqvi pays tribute to martyrs during visit to FC Balochistan North Headquarters
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 27 (APP):Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi visited the Headquarters of Frontier Corps Balochistan (North), where he was presented a guard of honour by a contingent of FC Balochistan North.
IG FC Balochistan North, Major General Abid Mazhar, introduced the officer to the Minister. He also visited the Martyrs’ Monument, laid floral wreath, and offered Fateha.
Interior Minister prayed for the elevation of the ranks of the FC martyrs and paid tribute to their invaluable sacrifices. Major General Abid Mazhar briefed the Minister about the training and professional standards of the force.
Appreciating the services of Frontier Corps North in establishing peace in Balochistan, the Interior Minister said that FC Balochistan North is a distinguished force whose sacrifices for peace are indelible.
He further stated that the officers and personnel of this force have made history through their courage in defeating the evil dedigns of “Fitna-e-Hindustan.” The Interior Minister said the nation is proud of the professional skills and bravery of the FC Balochistan North.
